entry.summary:
RTâ€‚Tesla Sentry Mode enables your Tesla to monitor & record potential threats while parked
Zack:â€‚Sentry Mode on my Model Y just saved us from having its wheels stolen this morning. Time and time again sentry mode proves to be a priceless asset to owning a @Tesla.
